# This page has information about me.

* I got my bachelor degree at Case Western Reserve University in May, 2020. My undergraduate program is BS Biochemistry. 
* I have been a member in a lab which focuses on the research of antibiotics for three years during my undergraduate program and participated in one of our lab's research paper which has been preparing to publication.  
* I'm currently in Pharmaceutical Statistics track of MS Biostatistics program at Mailman School of Public Health at the Columbia University and will get my master degree in May, 2022.
* I'm a member of an indie band on Tencent muisican website which is a Chinese online music platform. Our music style mainly focuses on pop rock, post-rock, R&B and dream pop. I'm mainly in charge of composing and arranging music.
